title: Historian on women in the Revolution - role

content.question: The women described in the excerpt would have most typically engaged in which of the following activities during the Revolutionary era?

choices.label: Writing plays in support of independence
Campaigning for the right to vote as a wartime measure
Joining militias so that they could fight on the front lines of battle
Producing goods for the Patriot cause

content.answer: Producing goods for the Patriot cause

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
